txt.en:
'With our defeat at Brôntrig, we must refocus our efforts in the Isendale. The army at Wulf's Cleft is growing stronger with every passing day, and we must now turn our attention to weakening that force.

'Garrun, another of my scouts, has encamped near Wulf's Cleft to observe their muster and report on their movements. You should join him there and lend him what aid you may.

'Journey due west into the valleys until you reach the cliff face north of Cuvnerth, another village of the Dunlendings.'

'Hail, [placeholder]! I was told to expect you. You are highly regarded by many of our captains here in Dunland, and I am honoured to make your acquaintance.\n\n'There have been massive movements of Dunlending forces to and from Wulf's Cleft, and we have much work ahead of us.'
'Find Garrun, [placeholder], and lend him your aid.'
Following the rout at Brôntrig, Ardwyn proposes shifting his forces' focus in the Isendale.
Talk to Garrun in the Isendale

Garrun is encamped against a cliff face far to the west of Forthbrond, north of Cuvnerth.\n\nArdwyn has asked you to seek out the scout Garrun at the western edge of the Isendale and lend him your aid.
